name: Sailing into the Sunset
description:
WARNING: The current version loses focuses on some web browsers, if you click out of the game window you may not be able to recover focus on the game and you will need to reload this page. The game doesn't work in Safari :(

There are multiple endings

Press SPACE or ENTER to continue with the text dialogs.

Some mini games uses the mouse and other the ASDW and SPACE keys.
